Announcements
=============

![](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Election.jpg)

City General Election 2025
--------------------------

Posted on [December 11, 2024May 5, 2025](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/announcements/city-general-election-2025/)

[Copy of 2025 Unofficial Results](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Copy-of-2025-Unofficial-Results-5.5.2025.pdf)

[Sample Ballot](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/2025-sample-ballot.pdf)

Rosters:

* [Roster Election Day 5-3-2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Roster-Election-Day-5-3-2025.pdf)
* [Roster for Early Voting in Person 4/22/2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/2025-Roster-for-Early-Voting-in-Person-PDF-1.pdf)
* [Roster for Early Voting in Person 4/23/2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Roster-for-Early-Voting-in-Person-4-23-2025.pdf)
* [Roster for Early Voting in Person 4/24/2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Roster-for-Early-Voting-in-Person-4-24-2025.pdf)
* [Roster for Early Voting in Person 4/25/2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Roster-for-Early-Voting-in-Person-4-25-2025.pdf)
